content: Chengyu Song Chengyu Song Home Research Publications CV Chengyu Song Associate Professor Department of Computer Science and Engineering University of California, Riverside Office: 314 Winston Chung Hall Email: csong@cs.ucr.edu Phone: (951) 827-5478 Google Scholar — GitHub — dblp About Me I am an Associate Professor in the department of Computer Science and Engineering at UC Riverside. I earned by Ph.D. in Computer Science from Georgia Tech. I was fortunate to be supervised by professor Wenke Lee and Taesoo Kim. My research interests include system security, deep learning, program analysis and verification, and operating systems. My current research focuses on vulnerability related topics, including Advancing techniques for finding vulnerabilities. Eliminating vulnerabilities through automatic code transformation and verification. New exploit techniques and automated exploit generation. Runtime exploit prevention with software hardware co-design.
